Title: Gorillaman
Description:
['A school comedy about a mute transfer student, Tadashi  Iketo, who is constant\xadly shuffled from school to school for his  "violent nature," though he really is a mild-mannered boy constantly taunt\xaded into fights over his simian appearance. ', '
', '
', '
', '
Based on a 1989 manga in  Young Magazine by Harold Sakuishi. ', '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)']
